productName: COBY Sports MP3 Player with 256 MB Flash Memory and Arm Band
title: Cheap and easy = short lifespan
author: C. Kalinowski "absorbentone"
fullText: shopping mp3 player wasnt looking expensive cheap easy extremely easy upload remove songs easy didnt read directions software install doesnt hold impressive amount songs 50 55 depending length songs personally earbuds werent padded ears recommend mp3 player person looking cheap easy dont expect time mere 5 months mine die care

productName: COBY Sports MP3 Player with 256 MB Flash Memory and Arm Band
title: great while it lasted

fullText: walking park didnt expect died weeks stopped shut removed battery hooked computer didnt recognize easy load songs fit 60
